description:
Friendly is a fast, simple and secure Facebook app. With over 8 million downloads, it is the leading Facebook app alternative  for iPhone, iPad, iPod and Mac.

Unlike the official Facebook application, Friendly has been optimized to save space on your device, and preserve your battery.

For users with multiple Facebook Accounts, or families sharing a device, Friendly makes it easy to switch between accounts.

Friendly offers many ways to customize Facebook:
- News feed Option: order timeline by Most Recent or Top Stories
- Pick your favorite color
- Setup a 4-digit passcode to secure access to your account
- Quick navigation to your favorites friends
- Configurable birthday reminders
- Configurable AdBlock
- Read / Respond to messages directly from Friendly (no need of the messenger app!)

Many other small features differentiate Friendly for Facebook from the official Facebook app:
- Edit Comments
- Copy and Paste test to other applications
- Save Images
- Save to Pocket
- Save to Reading List
- Article View  by Readability

GIVE FRIENDLY A TRY - IT'S FREE TODAY!
And don't hesitate to reach out if you need anything.

-------------------------------------
FOR HELP & FEEDBACK
Please visit our Facebook Support page: http://facebook.com/getFriendly
or contact us by email at: help @ friendlyappstudio.com
-------------------------------------

Notes:
- Facebook® and the Facebook logo are trademarks of Facebook Inc.
- Friendly is not affiliated with, endorsed, or sponsored by Facebook

releaseNotes:
FIXES AND ENHANCEMENTS

+ Fixes reported crashes
+ Fixes delete messages
+ Fixes other actions on messages
+ Fixes login to Instagram
+ Enhanced scrolling speed

Thanks to everyone who reported issues on
our Facebook support page:
http://facebook.com/getfriendly

If you like friendly, please remember we
depend on your reviews and word of mouth.
Let your friends know, and tell us how much
you like the app by leaving a review
on the App Store.

If you are using the free (ad supported) version,
please consider upgrading.

Thanks you!
